statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the trapezoid above. Side lengths are measurements.
The bottom has length \displaystyle{13.79}; top has length \displaystyle{8.80}. The sides have lengths \displaystyle{10.60} and \displaystyle{10.74}. The height is \displaystyle{10.37}.

solution.p: The perimeter is the sum of the four sides which are given. \displaystyle{8.80}+{10.74}+{13.79}+{10.60}={43.93}.
